We spent 10 days in Madrid and Barcelona.  This place was recommended by a local friend in Barcelona.  It was the best meal we had the entire trip!  Most everything we had was the best version of it from the trip.The Paella was good, but a bit small.The croquettes were great.The Sangria was very good and they had a bunch of different flavors to try.The best part of the meal was the flan at the end!  It was the best Flan I have ever had!
